import React ,{Component, useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import { Grid, Paper } from '@material-ui/core'; import * as historyService from "../../Axios-Actions/historyService"; const OrderHistory=()=> { const [task,setTask]=React.useState('') useEffect(() => { historyService.getAllOrders() .then((result) => {this.setTask( result.data )}); }, [] ) return (

Order History

    { task.map(t=>(
  • Title Starting Time End time Month Service type Location Total Bill Serviceprovider Email
    {t.title} {t.starttime} {t.endtime} {t.month} {t.servicetype} {t.location} {(t.month*t.permonth)+(t.pertask)+(t.perhour*(parseInt(t.endtime)-parseInt(t.starttime))*(t.month*30))} {t.serviceprovideremail}
    • )) }
); } export default orderHistory ;
